thread.title: Watch: B.A.P Has Potentially Way Too Much Fun Dancing Around On “Idol Arcade”
thread.title_full: Watch: B.A.P Has Potentially Way Too Much Fun Dancing Around On “Idol Arcade”

author: christinaoh21
title: Watch: B.A.P Has Potentially Way Too Much Fun Dancing Around On “Idol Arcade”
text:
Shares 184   
B.A.P is the latest idol group to be invited to “Idol Arcade” and it’s possible that the group had way too much fun during their corner. 
The title of the video is “Any Dance Party” and the group was tasked with playing a dancing video game. Whether they were dancing or cheering on other members playing the game or laughing at the playback videos of their dance, the B.A.P members were in good spirits the entire time. 
Meanwhile, B.A.P returned with their title track “Wake Me Up.” Unfortunately, member Himchan recently suffered a minor injury to his ribs, which changed plans slightly for future performances for the group’s promotions. 
Watch the video below!
